review.message: No Tier 1 (Beginner) review file at l2-uk-en/a2/review/asking-for-directions-review.md. REDO: DELETE the existing review file and regenerate from scratch. Run /review-content-core-a using claude_extensions/commands/review-tiers/tier-1-beginner.md. Do NOT patch the existing review — start fresh. You MUST: (1) read every line of the .md and activities .yaml, (2) check every English explanation is B1-readable and encouraging, (3) verify every Ukrainian sentence + IPA transcription, (4) apply the 'Would I Continue?' test from the tier-1 guide, (5) score each dimension honestly and list at least 1 real issue.
